post.title: Scott Charney on Critical Infrastructure Protection
post.title_plain: Scott Charney on Critical Infrastructure Protection
post.content: Scott Charney is the Vice President of Trustworthy Computing for Microsoft. If you’ve never seen him present, check out this talk on Critical Infrastructure Protection that he gave at UW last year. Even if you don’t care about critical infrastructure protection (all none of you) you should check out Scott’s talk because he’s a great presenter. Great stories, great connection with the audience and no crutches slides.
